items.sentence: What\'s the difference between Cantonese and Mandarin?
We\'re going to have to have a birthday party for Tom.
Who\'s that guy over there who looks so much like Tom?
I could help you make a list of things we need to buy.
Don\'t feel bad. Tom didn\'t give me a present either.
You can\'t expect Tom to care about it the way you do.
You can\'t hit Tom and expect him not to hit you back.
You don\'t have to go to the party unless you want to.
I don\'t think Tom is going to study French next year.
I don\'t think Tom will be sleeping when we get there.
